overview: Football is everything to Kam who has lived near the Ainsworth Estate pitch all his life.  In 2013, with his good friend Hassan, Kam approached the Arsenal Foundation to resurface the pitch from concrete to astroturf.  He is now a Coach to the local kids and this area represents so much more than just a playing field.  It is the beating heart of the Estate and football the international language that binds the entire community together.
title: Ainsworth
